Verses: 1  ungalil Oruvanukku Veroruvanode Vazhakkundaanaal, Vazhakkaadumpadi Avan Parisuththavaangalidaththil Pogaamal, Aneedhakkaararidaththil Pogath Thunigiradhenna?
2  parisuththavaangal Ulagaththai Niyaayandheerppaargalendru Ariyeergalaa? Ulagam Ungalaal Niyaayandheerkkappaduvadhaayirukka, Arpa Vazhakkugalaith Theerkka Neengal Apaaththiraraa?
3  deva Thoodhargalaiyum Niyaayantheerppomendru Ariyeergalaa? Appadiyirukka, Indha Jeevanukketravaigalai Neengal Theerththukkollakkoodaadhirukkiradhu Eppadi?
4  indha Jeevanukketra Vazhakkugal Ungalukku Irundhaal, Theerppuchcheygiradharku, Sabaiyil Arpamaai Ennappattavargalai Niyamiththukkollungal.
5  ungalukku Vetkam Undaagumpadi Idhai Sollugiren. Sagodharanukkum Sagodharanukkum Undaana Vazhakkaith Theerkkaththakka Vivegi Oruvanaagilum Ungalukkul Illaiyaa?
6  sagodharanode Sagodharan Vazhakkaadugiraan, Avisuvaasigalukku Munbaagavum Appadi Seygiraan

7  neengal Oruvarodoruvar Vazhakkaadugiradhu Evvidhaththilum Kutramaayirukkiradhu. Appadi Seygiradhaivida Neengal En Aniyaayaththai Sagiththukkollugiradhillai, En Nashtaththaip Poruththukkollugiradhillai?
8  neengale Aniyaayanseygireergal, Nashtappaduththugireergal; Sagodhararukkum Appadi Seygireergale.

9  aniyaayakkaarar Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Sudhandharippadhillaiyendru Ariyeergalaa? Vanjikkappadaadhirungal; Vesimaarkkaththaarum, Vikkiragaaraadhanaikkaararum, Vibachaarakkaararum, Suyapunarchchikkaararum, Aanpunarchchikkaararum,
10  thirudarum, Porulaasaikkaararum, Veriyarum, Udhaasinarum, Kollaikkaararum Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Sudhandharippadhillai.

11  ungalil Silar Ippadippattavargalaayirundheergal; Aayinum Karththaraagiya Yesuvin Naamaththinaalum, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Aaviyinaalum Kazhuvappatteergal, Parisuththamaakkappatteergal, Needhimaangalaakkappatteergal.
12  ellaavatraiyum Anubavikka Enakku Adhigaaramundu, Aagilum Ellaam Thagudhiyaayiraadhu; Ellaavatraiyum Anubavikka Enakku Adhigaaramundu, Aagilum Naan Ondrirkum Adimaippadamaatten.

13  vayitrukkup Pojanamum Pojanaththukku Vayirum Erkum; Aanaalum Dhevan Idhaiyum Adhaiyum Azhiyappannuvaar. Sareeramo Vesiththanaththirkalla, Karththarukke Uriyadhu;karththarum Sareeraththirku Uriyavar.
14  dhevan Karththarai Ezhuppinaare, Nammaiyum Thamadhu Vallamaiyinaale Ezhuppuvaar.
15  ungal Sareerangal Kiristhuvin Avayavangalendru Ariyeergalaa? Appadiyirukka, Naan Kiristhuvin Avayavangalai Vesiyin Avayavangalaakalaamaa? Appadi Seyyalaagaadhe.
16  vesiyodu Isaindhirukkiravan Avaludane Ore Sareeramaayirukkiraanendru Ariyeergalaa? Iruvarum Ore Maamsamaayiruppaargal Endru Solliyirukkiradhe.
17  appadiye Karththarodisaindhirukkiravanum, Avarudane Ore Aaviyaayirukkiraan.
18  vesiththanaththirku Vilagiyodungal. Manushan Seygira Endha Paavamum Sareeraththirku Purambaayirukkum; Vesiththananj Seygiravano Than Suyasareeraththirku Virodhamaaip Paavanseygiraan.
19  ungal Sareeramaanadhu Neengal Dhevanaale Petrum Ungalil Thangiyum Irukkira Parisuththa Aaviyinudaiya Aalayamaayirukkiradhendrum, Neengal Ungaludaiyavargalallavendrum Ariyeergalaa?
20  kirayaththukkuk Kollappatteergale; Aagaiyaal Dhevanukku Udaiyavaigalaagiya Ungal Sareeraththinaalum Ungal Aaviyinaalum Dhevanai Magimaippaduththungal.
